summary: Documentation menu items are not in alphabetical order, forcing users to use search (Cmd-F) instead of scrolling. The author suggests sorting menu items to improve discoverability.
userImpact: Users cannot easily find documentation items by scrolling and must resort to search functionality.
workaround: Use Cmd-F search to find desired documentation items.
resolutionDetails: Maintainer indicated preference to exclude generated protobuf type definitions from API reference rather than implementing alphabetical sorting.
keyQuote: Yeah, we might just want to not output any of the generated protobuf type defs in the API reference.
